marketplaces.name: claude-skills
marketplaces.description: Autonomous Claude Code plugin with intelligent orchestration, continuous learning, and self-optimization. Prevents mistakes, auto-improves code, learns patterns, and leverages all Claude capabilities.

files.README.md:
# claude-skills

Autonomous Claude Code plugin.

## Install

```bash
/plugin marketplace add Cain-Ish/claude-skills
/plugin install claude-skills-v2@claude-skills
```

## Features

- Auto-formats code
- Validates dangerous commands  
- Learns patterns
- Uses all Claude capabilities

Zero configuration.

plugins.name: claude-skills-v2
plugins.description: Unified autonomous plugin: PreToolUse validation, PostToolUse auto-formatting, continuous learning with confidence scoring, super-orchestrator leveraging all Claude capabilities (agents, skills, plugins, web search, MCP). Self-maintaining with zero documentation.
